channel.title: MectriCal Release Notes :: Mectric MSE Help
channel.description: MectriCal 0.18 21/06/2025 Device Firmware MVIC v.1.2.0 - NEW! uPDM4 v.2.0.5 MectriCal 0.17 04/06/2025 New Features Added Release Notes link button to firmware update utility. Bug Fixes Logs not auto-saving when no save directory is set - fixed. Second uPDM4 not opening properly when more than one unit on the same CAN bus - fixed. Device Firmware MVIC v.1.1.4 uPDM4 v.2.0.5 - NEW! MectriCal 0.16 14/02/2025 New Features Added support for MVIC CAN Checksums. Device Firmware
